synopsis.text: The Ajin: Demi-Human OVAs offer additional stories and insights into the dark fantasy world depicted in the main anime series. The first OVA dives into the mysterious "Shinya Nakamura Incident", which the Ajin Control Committee fears above all else. This incident reveals critical truths about the first discovered Ajin demi-human, setting the stage for the anime's events. The second OVA takes a lighter tone, giving humorous and unexpected glimpses into the daily lives of the main characters. By peeking behind the curtain, viewers can develop a deeper connection to these personalities. The third OVA flashes back to Satou's past, chronicling his initial capture of an Ajin demi-human in Africa and his own shocking self-discovery. This formative experience shaped Satou into the complex antagonist he later becomes. Together, these OVAs complement the anime's dark action and suspense with humanizing comedy and revelatory backstory. They invite watchers to more fully inhabit the world of Ajin and understand what set its conflicted heroes and villains on their desperate trajectories.
